DOC.brief_summary: Effects plant base ingredient blood glucose Type II diabetes patient .
DOC.brief_title: Plant-based Ingredient Post Prandial Glucose Type II Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: The study design determine extend plant base ingredient food format affect blood glucose response untreated Type II diabetes patient .
DOC.criteria: Male female volunteer confirm Type II diabetes treat pharmaceuticalbased glucose lower treatment past three month ( control solely diet exercise ) ; Age ≥ 20 ≤ 65 year screening ; Body Mass Index ( BMI ) ≥18 ≤ 32 kg/m2 ; HbA1c ≥48 mmol/mol ≤53 mmol/mol ( ≥ 6.5 % ≤ 7.0 % ) . At discretion study physician , subject HbA1c > 53 mmol/mol < 58 mmol/mol ( > 7.0 % < 7.5 % ) control solely diet exercise also allow participate . Being employee Unilever research site ; Chronic smoker , tobacco chewer drinker ; No medication , include vitamin tonic , except cholesterol , determine physician ; Reported weight loss/gain ≥ 10 % body weight 6 month precede screening ; Allergy food cosmetic ; If female , pregnant planning pregnancy study period ; If female , lactate lactate 6 week prestudy investigation and/or study period .
